com.swarmconnect

Class SwarmLeaderboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swarmconnect.SwarmLeaderboard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SwarmLeaderboard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Contains variables and methods for interacting with Swarm Leaderboards
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • id

        public int id
        This Leaderboard's unique integer identification number.

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        This Leaderboard's name (i.e. Title).

      • format

        public SwarmLeaderboard.LeaderboardFormat format
        This Leaderboard's format. The format specifies if the Leaderboard will display as Integer values, Float values, or Time values.

        public int min_version
        The minimum app version number that will use this leaderboard.

    • Method Detail

      • showLeaderboard

        public void showLeaderboard()
        Display this Leaderboard to the user. With this method, the Leaderboard will default to showing scores for This Week.

      • showLeaderboard

        public void showLeaderboard(SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange dateRange)
        Display this Leaderboard to the user with the specified default date range using one of SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange.XXXXX values
        Parameters:
        dateRange - The default date range for scores shown on the Leaderboard (i.e., day, week, month, all time). Use one of the SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange.XXXXX values.

      • showLeaderboard

        public static void showLeaderboard(int leaderboardId)
        Display the specified Leaderboard to the user. With this method, the Leaderboard will default to showing scores for This Week.
        Parameters:
        leaderboardId - The identification number of the leaderboard to display.

      • showLeaderboard

        public static void showLeaderboard(int leaderboardId,
                   SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange dateRange)
        Display the specified Leaderboard to the user with the specified default date range using one of SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange.XXXXX values. If the specified Leaderboard does not exist for this app, then this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        leaderboardId - The identification number of the Leaderboard to display.
        dateRange - The default date range for scores shown on the Leaderboard (i.e., day, week, month, all time). Use one of the SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange.XXXXX values.

      • submitScore

        public void submitScore(float score)
        Submit a score to this Leaderboard. If the user is not logged in, then this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        score - The score to be submitted.

      • submitScore

        public void submitScore(float score,
               java.lang.String data)
        Submit a score to this Leaderboard. If the user is not logged in, then this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        score - The score to be submitted.
        data - A payload String that is included with the score submission. If not needed, an empty string is an acceptable value.

      • submitScore

        public void submitScore(float score,
               java.lang.String data,
               SwarmLeaderboard.SubmitScoreCB cb)
        Submit a score to this Leaderboard. If the user is not logged in, then this method does nothing.
        Parameters:
        score - The score to be submitted.
        data - A payload String that is included with the score submission. If not needed, an empty string is an acceptable value.
        cb - The callback that returns after an attempt to submit the score. If the submission is successful the callback returns the user's Leaderboard rank (in the form of an int) and displays a Swarm notification to the user which contains the user's score. If the submission fails, then the callback returns -1.

      • submitScore

        public static void submitScore(int leaderboardId,
               float score)
        Submit a score to the specified Leaderboard. If you intend to show the leaderboard right after the score is submitted use submitScoreAndShowLeaderboard(int, float).
        Parameters:
        leaderboardId - The identification number of the leaderboard
        score - The score to be submitted.

      • submitScore

        public static void submitScore(int leaderboardId,
               float score,
               java.lang.String data)
        Submit a score to the specified Leaderboard. If you intend to show the leaderboard right after the score is submitted use submitScoreAndShowLeaderboard(int, float, String).
        Parameters:
        leaderboardId - The identification number of the leaderboard.
        score - The score to be submitted.
        data - A payload String that is included with the score submission. null-safe.

      • submitScore

        public static void submitScore(int leaderboardId,
               float score,
               java.lang.String data,
               SwarmLeaderboard.SubmitScoreCB cb)
        Submit a score to the specified Leaderboard.
        Parameters:
        leaderboardId - The identification number of the leaderboard.
        score - The score to be submitted.
        data - A payload String that is included with the score submission. If not needed, an empty string is an acceptable value.
        The - callback that returns after an attempt to submit the score. If the submission is successful the callback returns the user's Leaderboard rank (in the form of an int) and displays a Swarm notification to the user which contains the user's name, user's rank, and user's score. If the submission fails, then the callback returns -1.

      • submitScoreAndShowLeaderboard

        public static void submitScoreAndShowLeaderboard(int leaderboardId,
                                 float score)
        Submit a score to the specified Leaderboard and then immediately show the specified Leaderboard.
        Parameters:
        leaderboardId - The identification number of the Leaderboard
        score - The score to be submitted.

      • submitScoreAndShowLeaderboard

        public static void submitScoreAndShowLeaderboard(int leaderboardId,
                                 float score,
                                 java.lang.String data)
        Submit a score to the specified Leaderboard and then immediately show the specified Leaderboard.
        Parameters:
        leaderboardId - The identification number of the Leaderboard
        score - The score to be submitted.
        data - A payload String that is included with the score submission. If not needed, an empty string is an acceptable value.

      • getTopScores

        public void getTopScores(SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange dateRange,
                SwarmLeaderboard.GotScoresCB cb)
        Get the top page of scores for this Leaderboard.
        Parameters:
        dateRange - The date range requested, one of SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange.XXXXX.
        cb - The callback returns the Leaderboard page number and Leaderboard ID on success, and returns -1 on failure.

      • getPageOfScoresForCurrentUser

        public void getPageOfScoresForCurrentUser(SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange dateRange,
                                 SwarmLeaderboard.GotScoresCB cb)
        Get the page of scores for this Leaderboard that contains the user's score.
        Parameters:
        dateRange - The date range requested, one of SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange.XXXXX.
        cb - The callback returns the Leaderboard page number and Leaderboard ID on success, and returns -1 on failure.

      • getPageOfScores

        public void getPageOfScores(int pageNum,
                   SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange dateRange,
                   SwarmLeaderboard.SocialScope scope,
                   SwarmLeaderboard.GotScoresCB cb)
        Get a specified page of scores for this Leaderboard. Page 0 contains the top scores for the Leaderboard. If the user is offline, then this function will only return the currently logged in user's scores for this leaderboard.
        Parameters:
        pageNum - The Leaderboard page number requested.
        dateRange - The date range requested, one of SwarmLeaderboard.DateRange.XXXXXX.
        scope - The scope of the scores requested, one of SwarmLeaderboard.SocialScope.XXXXXX.
        cb - The callback returns the Leaderboard page number and Leaderboard ID on success, and returns -1 on failure.

      • getScoreForUser

        public void getScoreForUser(int userId,
                   SwarmLeaderboard.GotScoreCB cb)
        Get the SwarmLeaderboardScore for a particular user on this Leaderboard. If multiple scores are available for this user, the best one all time score returned.
        Parameters:
        userId - The SwarmUser userId requested.
        cb - The callback returns a SwarmLeaderboardScore on success, null on failure.

      • getScoreForUser

        public void getScoreForUser(SwarmUser user,
                   SwarmLeaderboard.GotScoreCB cb)
        Get the SwarmLeaderboardScore for a particular user on this Leaderboard. If multiple scores are available for this user, the best one all time score is returned.
        Parameters:
        userId - The SwarmUser userId requested.
        cb - The callback returns a SwarmLeaderboardScore on success, null on failure.

      • getLeaderboardById

        public static void getLeaderboardById(int leaderboardId,
                      SwarmLeaderboard.GotLeaderboardCB cb)
        Get a specified Leaderboard.
        Parameters:
        leaderboardId - The Leaderboard ID of the Leaderboard being requested.
        cb - Returns the specified Leaderboard on success, and returns null on failure.

      • getLeaderboardsList

        public static void getLeaderboardsList(SwarmLeaderboard.GotLeaderboardsListCB cb)
        Get a list of available Leaderboards for this application.
        Parameters:
        cb - Returns a list of Leaderboard objects on success, and returns null on failure.
